column2: You are overcome by the Beast and frenzy!
Oh no! What I have a done!?!
I was able to get control of myself.  The frenzy is fading.  I am myself, again.
At least it over, for now...
In my frenzy, I killed a human being!
How many more must die to saite the beast?
In my frenzy, I have have injured a supernatural being!
I went into frenzy in Elysium, disturbing the peace.
I have violated the Masquerade and accidentally revealed my true nature to the kine during a frenzy!
